title: How Can My Wife and I Learn To Fight Better?
description:
In this episode, we talk about coping with COVID-related germophobia, what to do when someone you love is hiding an addiction, and whether or not it really is healthy to fight in marriage.
  Listener feedback: Is John on cocaine?
 Since COVID I've become OCD about germs & sickness
 My brother is an alcoholic but his wife wants to keep it a secret
 How do my wife and I learn to fight better?
 Lyrics of the Day: "Cocaine" - Eric Clapton
